
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/KanRiChu/p/18669660" title="发布于 2025-01-14 08:55">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">R语言系列—Rstudio简介和安装</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">　　同学们，大家好，今天</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">继续更新</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">R语言系列。今天我们开始讲R语言的集成开发环境（IDE）—Rstudio，这里会对Rstudio及其安装进行介绍，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">感兴趣的同学可以重点关注一下。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体">Rstudio简介</span></strong></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px">　　Rstudio是R语言一个常用的集成开发环境（IDE），包括控制台、语法高亮显示的编辑器，支持直接代码执行以及画图、浏览历史、调试和工作区管理等功能的强大工具，包含Rstudio Desktop（Rstudio桌面应用版）和Rstudio Server的网页版。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体">Rstudio安装</span></strong></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">　　Rstudio可通过其官方网站进行下载，可根据需要下载桌面应用版或网页版。桌面应用版是直接以应用的方式安装在本地电脑上的，网页版是需要部署在远端服务器上的，可以通过特定的网络接口进行访问，其官方网址为：</span><a href="https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/</span></a></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">　　大部分情况下是在本地电脑使用的，所以这里对</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">Rstudio Desktop版及其安装进行介绍。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　1、<span style="font-family: 宋体">下载</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">Rstudio Desktop版</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">　　打开官方网站点击</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">DOWNLOAD RSTUDIO DESKTOP FOR WINDOWS进行下载</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1520524/202501/1520524-20250113235826919-901186071.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;<span style="font-family: Calibri">　　2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、找到下载的安装文件，双击进行安装</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1520524/202501/1520524-20250113235850808-1090441949.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;　　<span style="font-family: 宋体">按照提示进行安装，直到安装完成</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1520524/202501/1520524-20250113235910489-621170878.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><strong><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">界面介绍</span></strong></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　1、<span style="font-family: 宋体">主界面</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">　　打开</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">软件，会出现如下图所示界面。</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">界面分为</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">个区域，其中</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">区域为代码区，可以在这个位置写代码及运行代码；</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">区域分为</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Environment</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">History</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Connections</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">和</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Tutorial</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，其中</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Environment</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">展示当前环境中的变量、数据、创建的函数等信息，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">History</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">展示代码运行历史情况，保存已运行过的代码，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Connections</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">用于连接和管理外部数据库，方便操作大型数据，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Tutorial</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">是</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">中设置的专门用于学习和教学的区域；</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">区域为代码运行区，展示代码运行情况及运行结果；</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">区域为文件、图形、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">R</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">包、帮助文档等的展示区域，当前文件夹下的文件、当前绘制的图形、当前环境中的</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">R</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">包及函数的帮助文档都可以在这个区域查看。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1520524/202501/1520524-20250114000013870-1949537699.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　2、<span style="font-family: 宋体">上方功能区</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: Calibri">　　Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">界面上方为</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">的功能区，这里又分为</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">File</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Edit</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Code</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">View</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Plots</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Session</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Build</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Debug</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Profile</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Tools</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">和</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Help</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">。功能区涉及的内容比较多，这里只对常用功能进行介绍。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">点击</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">File</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">展示下拉菜单，可以进行新建文件、新建项目、打开文件、打开项目、保存文件、保存为</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">...</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">等操作。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">　　点击</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Tools</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">展示下拉菜单，在该下拉菜单，可以进行安装</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">R</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">包、检查</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">R</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">包更新等操作，在其</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Global Options</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">选项中，可以对</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">R</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">语言版本进行选择，可以对</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">主界面的文件大小、字体等进行设置。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1520524/202501/1520524-20250114000038952-332981961.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">　　以上为</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">的简单介绍，其更多功能及使用方法，在后续学习中涉及到了再进行详解介绍。接下来的会对</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">R</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">语言语法及编程进行讲解，以后</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">R</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">语言的学习也都在</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Rstudio</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">中进行。</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
